div.p:
primus testis The xv day of nouembre yer' et cetera lxxiiij comperit before the baillies Dauy
prowdefute of Dunde tobere witnes anent the disposicione and selling
of Johne stevynnis gudis the quhilk the gret aith sworne deponit
that Johne of ruthirfurd sawlde certane lentrinwar of the said Johne stevin
nys for iii merkis and v scot the hundre bot he saide he woste nocht how
mekle he sawld of the price

2us testis Dauy gravnt in forfar dwelland secund witnes deponit be his
aith that he wiste that the said Johne of ruthirfurd sawld lentrinwar
for quhite claith for xvj merkis and viij scot as com til the hundre bot
how mekil he sawld or quha aucht it he wate nocht

3us testis Wil robertson thrid witnes the gret aith sworne deponit that Johne
of ruthirfurd sawlde of Johne stevinnis clath xl eln' for xv merkis
and viij scot as it com to the hundre And als he deponit that he sawld
his lentrinwar that he had of the said Johne stevinnis for iij merkis
and v scot as it com the hundre and that he sawlde his futefel
for iiij merkis and demi as it com to the jC bot how mekil thare was
he wate nocht And that he wist he sawld xxx eln of claith
for vij s' the eln and that he saw Johne berclay sel iij eln'
and demi of carsay for viii s' the eln / all thir forsaidis pricis of the money
of Danskyn
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio die xviija nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiij

quo die
Andreas michelson et henricus makyson posuerunt se in voluntate prepositi videlicet
ipsorum quilibet de amerciamento curie pro tannacione correat'

Die xixa nouembris anno predicto Willelmus lorymar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta
porrectione plegii super alexandrum cassy asserendo ipsum iniuste conduxisse andream
seruum suum conducticium et contrarium inuentum fuit / eo quod dictus andreas purgauit
se per Juramentum suum ex deliberacione assise quod non fuit seruus conductus dicti
Willelmi lorymar tempore quo conduxit ipsum cum dicto alexandro

The same day Adam litstar chalansit Johne his son' of the wrangwis' halding of
vj li' and demi merk for wad of the quhilk some' he gravntit iij li' in presence of the bailye
and the lave to gude commpt and rekning the quhilkis iij li' the balye chargit
him to content and pay within xv dais the quhilk he is oblist todo be his hand
and gudez

Die xxiiijta mensis nouembris anno prescripto In curia ballivorum fynlaus fores
manucepit probare infra hinc et festum natalis Domini nostri proximo futuro
quod appunctuatum fuit inter ipsum et Johannem neilson de montros penes summam
iij li' in qua obligatur dicto Johanni tanquam debitor pro Waltero ross' quod si
principalis debitor non fateretur xx s' de dicta summa ipse fynlaus vlterius non
astringeritur quam pro xl s' ipsum in curia confessatis et si deficiat in dicta probacione
obligatur satisfacere dicto Johanni aut suis procuratoribus integram summam iij li infra
dictum terminum absque vlteriori dilacione

The same day it was fundin be ane assise that Gelis of the over myl
sal wp hauld the myl dam fra the owkat to the frere wal for
his termys et cetera
alexander baxtar in amerciamento pro fractione statuti de pondere panis et cetera

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxviijo die nouembris anno et cetera lxxiiijto
quo die curia affirmata et sectis vocatis absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die edmundus hay posuit se in voluntate prepositi et ballivorum de perturbacione curie
et ideo in amerciamento et cetera

Dauid spens inuenit alexandrum rolland plegium legalem de indempnitate edmundi hay
aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter edmundus lowson plegius de indempnitate eiusdem
Dauidis per dictum edmundum et cetera

The same day Simon cordonar in amerciament for the wrangwis' halding
of certane lastis fra Johne of Dunde be the deliuerence of the assise

Item the said Johne elikewise in amerciament for the wrangwise halding
of ane agnus dei fra the said Simon

Ade of cadiou is ordanit be the assise tocontent and pay til gilbert of
chavmer betuix this and pais' next tocum ten s'

Edmundus hay adiudicatur in amerciamento pro foristallacione huius burgi tam infra quam
extra emendo et foristallando burgum ex deliberacione assise conuictus per eandem
et quod refutabat purgare se per suum Juramentum de dicta foristallacione

The first day of Decembre yer' et cetera lxxiiij It is ordanit decretit and
deliuerit be the aldirman and consel that gif it happinnis Morice talyour'
til offend gainstand or disobey ony offisar of this burgh aldirman balye
or seriand in the ministracione of thare office and he be convict tharapon
be ane assise he sal pay vnforgefin to the kirkwark xl s'

Die secunda Decembris Robertus huntar conuictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione
elizabeth rettry adiudicatur in amerciamento et emendabit eedem ad visum proborum
et in partem emende dabit dimediam libram cere ad missam sancti sanguinis
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio ixo die Decembris anno etc etera lxxiiij

quo die
Wilelmus moir et thomas moir ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento per confessionem proprias pro foris
tallacione pellium
Jacobus ihoneson in amerciamento pro foristallacione pellium et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum tenta in pretorio xijo die Decembris anno et cetera lxxiiijto
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die alexander fraser adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta extensione plegij super
georgium de Dis' de iniusta detencione vnius gladij Et dictus georgius quitus
per assisam eo quod Juravit quod huiusmodi gladium cuidam homini dicti alexandri tradidit et de
liberavit nomine et ex parte ipsius alexandri

Item the said day William of setoune and Anny baxtar oblist to vndirly the deli
uerence of the assise anent a borch strekit be the said William apon the
forsaid anny of the wrangwis' halding fra him of a govny' of caith
of the vail of xxti s' or of xxti s' of siluer failyeand the said govne be
hir promit as he allegit / Apon the quhilk the assise beand avisit
eftir the avaimentis of bath the partiis be thaim considerit and vndirstandin thai hafe
ordanit the said anny to content and pay the said William of setoune of
demi merk of siluer and quite of the lave of his chalance et cetera

Die xiija mensis et annj prescriptorum alexander pardonar' in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro perturbacione
et percussione cuiusdam mariote et in partem emende dabit dicte mulieri xij d'
Item eadem mariota in amerciamento pro perturbacione ipsius alexandri in verbo tantum

In curia ballivorum tenta xix die Decembris anno predicto thomas adamson in amerciamento
per confessionem propriam de iniusta percussione cuiusdam Willelmi piscarum alborum piscium
Et dictus Willelmus conuictus per assisam de perturbacione eiusdem thome

Vicesimo die Decembris mariota sponsa Roberti quhit in amerciamento pro iniusta capcione
vnius cacabi a sponsa Johannis talyour prout inuentum fuit per assisam et restaurabit
eundem cacabum dicte mulieri

Die xxiiijta Decembris Andreas scot conuictus fuit per assisam pro inobediencia Duncani
straloch vnius seriendorum suum officium excercen' et cetera

Curia Capitalis Ballivorum tenta in pretorio nono die Januarij anno et cetera lxxiiijto
qui die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die thomas de camera procurator et nomine procuratorio capellani altaris beate virginis ma
rie in ecclesia parrochiali huius burgi accedens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vno anuo red
ditu xij d' debit' annuatim dicto altari et capellano eiusdem et a longo tempore non solut'
de quadam terra iacente ad caput vici castri prout patet in processu primj diei Ad
quam terram personaliter accedens nichil reperit distringibile preter terram et lapides quos
presentavit in curia coram ballivis tanquam secundo die processus Testibus thoma
litstar Dauid bog et Johanne Vaus sergeando

Item dictus thomas de camera protestatus fuit quod dictus processus non sibi preiudicaret
quam ad annuum redditum xij d' sibi ut asserit annuatim debit' de dicta terra

Item eodem die dominus patricius tullach capellanus procurator altaris beati Ninianj in
ecclesia beati nicholai huius burgi Comparens ad barram protestatus fuit pro vna
annuo redditu vj s' et viij d' debito annuatim et a longo tempore non soluto de quadam
terra quondam Johannis colinj in vico viridi veluti patet in actione precedenti Ad quam
terram personaliter accedens nichil reperit distringibile ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum
preter terram et lapides quos presentavit in curia tanquam tercio die processus Testibus
Willelmo cummyn thoma pyot et Duncano straloch seriandorum vno

Thomas sadlar et egidius molendinarius convicti per assisam de perturbacione adin
uicem ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento

Item dictus thomas in amerciamento pro percussione iniusta megote famule alexandri Wischard
eo quod non purgauit se per assisam ut sibi iniungebatur

Henricus hartwikson fatebatur se debere Dauid de Kyntor quatuor
barellas salmonum coram ballivis protribunali sedentibus et precipiebatur sibi satisfacere
eidem infra terminum Juris

The same day the assise has deliuerit and fundin that gelis mylum soulde
hald In the wattir of the loch fra vthir menis scaith and that in defaut
of him thom sadlar has sustenit all the scaith that he has gottin

Die xija mensis Januarij anno et cetera lxxiiijto Coram preposito et ballivis in pretorio personaliter comparens
Paulus simonis de Danskyn magister sub deo cuiusdam nauis de Danskyn
fatebatur se plenarie solutum et contentum de naulo Johannis ruthirfurd burgensis
huius burgi super omnibus bonis et mercanciis per dictum Johannem carcatis in naui
dicti Pauli et apportatis ad portum huius burgi Vnde dictum Johannem inde
exoneravit et quieteclamauit imperpetuum Testibus Andrea scherar alexandro blind
sel alexandro rede gilberto Vaus Johanne Wormot et andrea baxtar burgensibus
dicti burgi cum multis aliis
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xiijo die Januarij anno predicto

the quhilk day William of
setoune was accusit for the wrangwise strublance of William cadiou cumand
apon him on forthocht felony and In breking of law borowis tayn betuix thame
of before the quhilk chalance the said William of setoune denyit sayand
that he was nocht vndir law borowis anent the said William of cadiou Apon the
quhilk accusacione and denyance he referrit him til ane assise of the best and
worthiast present for the tyme / the quhilk assise beand sworne the saidis parties
schavand thare / avaimentis to the assise in presence of the aldirman balyeis and
the hail court / the said William of setoune said that he was nocht vndir law
borowis to the quhilk Alexander menyes answerit sayand that the said William
of setoune had fundin law borowis anent the said William of cadiou baith
to the aldirman and baillies of this toune and before the king and the lordis of consel
and tharapon the said William avisit come before the court and keist downe
his hat perofferand him to fecht in the said querel / apon the quhilk the said
alexander menyes askit ane testimonial of the court how that he manansit and prouo
kit him sayand that it nedit nocht na that he wald nocht fecht in the said querel
sen that it mycht be determyt be the law and the assise / the quhilk Assise Riply
avisit fand and deliuerit that the said William of setoune had strublit William
of cadiou apon forthocht felony vndir law borowis / for the quhilk strublance
he was adiugit in amerciament of the court And the said William of cadiou
quite of all strublance of the said William of seton'

Item the said day the assise deliuerit that William of setoune had strublit and disso
beyit gilbert of chavmer ane of the baillies in the execucione of his office
and rychtsa that he had strublit the fenssit court for the the quhilk strublance of the
court he was adiugit in amerciament et cetera

Eodem die thomas yung commorans in burgo de perth in amerciamento pro iniusta extensone plegij
super Dauid galichly de iniusta detencione xiiij s' ab eodem Et dictus Dauid
quitus et liber de dicta calumpnia et clameo

Item Curia decreuit quod Johannes de catnes restaurabit vxori Roberti de
quhite vnum cacabum ex deposicione / et in amerciamento pro iniusta detencione dicti cacabi

Presentes in consilio cum preposito Alexander menyes Johannes de mar Ricardus de Kyntor
andreas alanson andreas scherar Johannes Wode Johannes de Knollis Rober
tus culan alexander blinschel Willelmus voket thomas de camera gilber
tus vaus Johannes Wormot Dauid mathoson Johannes glenmalvyn gilbertus
morison Dauid blabre et Dauid hil

Item the said xiij day of Januar' thir personis of the counsel vndirwritin togiddir
with the aldirman alexander of chavmer in that tyme that is tosay Johne of
mar Richard of Kyntor Johne Wode Robert of culan alexander blindsel
William voket thomas of chavmer Dauid symson gilbert of chavmer
gilbert the Vaus Johne Wormot patrik badenach Dauid mathoson
Johne of glenmalin gilbert morison and Dauy hil and Dauy blabre
with ane assent and consent has gravntit til Alexander menyes thare
nychtbour all and hail the landis of Bogfarloch with thare pertinentis for all
the daies of his liffe eftir that thai be redemit oute of his handis
the quhilk landis Edmond banerman had of the towne in wedset and
redemit be the said alexander / The said Alexander payand yerly eftir thai
be redemit / til the ton' foure merkis of mail at the vsuale termys of the
yer' videlicet Witsunday and martymes be evinly porciones allanerly for al
vthir seruice And gif it happinnis the said alexander todecesse before the
said Edmond banerman / The said Alexanderis ayris or assignais beand
content and payit of a hundreth merkis In cais' the said Edmond lufe
eftir the said alexander nothir sal the said Edmond na yet the said Alexanderis ayris
nor assignais hafe ony entres In the said tak bot at the wil of the
toune / the said alexanderis ayris or assignais beand content of the forsaid some

Memorandum that the forsaid xiij day of Januar' the yer' iiijC lxxiiij yer and
of the counsel beand present that is tosay Alexander menyes Androw alanson Johne of m
Richard of Kyntor androw scherar Johne Wode Johne of Knollis Robert of culan
alexander blinschel William Voket thomas of chamour gilbert the Vaus Johne Wor
mot Edmound lowson Dauid mathoson Johne of glenmalin gilbert morison
Dauid blabir Dauid symson gilbert of chavmer patrik badenach and Dauy
hil / the quhilkis avisitly the gude and the proffite of the hail toune diligently
considerit and vndirstandin in that part has gravntit and set and to ferme lat
tyn til Alexander of chavmer son' and apperand ayr til Alexander of chavmer of
murthil aldirman of aberdene in that tyme and til his helpis and assignais ane
or maa the toune of the Garrowne with the pertinens liand within the fredo
me of the said burgh for all and hail the termis of sevyn yeris next and
immediate eftir folowand the tyme of his entre or of his helpis or
assignais the quhilk entre salbe god willand at the feist of Witsun
day next eftir folowand the date of this present Act / The said Alexander
his helpis or assignais payand yerly for the mail of the said
tak with the pertinens sex merkis at twa vsuale termys of the yer' videlicet
Witsunday and martymes be evinly porciones / And the forsaid Alexander his
helpis or assignais sal pay at thare entre In and / with the said tak with
the pertinencis sevyn merkis of gressome' for the forsaidis termys of vij yeris
And gif it happinnis that ony persons makis clame to the forsaid tak
or pretendis til haue rycht til it the forsaid Alexander his helpis or assigna
is salbe procuratour for the toune and sal sustene the pley apon his or thar
awne expensis and costis and kepe the toune scaithles Mareatour the
forsaid Alexander and his fadir ar oblist before his entre to ryde the land
merys betuix the landis of gardyn and murthil And gif it happinnis
that ony vthir person optenis the said tak be way of rycht or resone the to
ne sal restore the said sevyn merkis of gressome til the said alexander
chamour his helpis or assignais but fraude or gile et cetera

The xiiii day of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxiiij Comperit before the aldirman and
the consel Dauid colson schawand to thame how that he was sickirly
infourmit that the aldirman and certane persons of the consel had gravntit til
Alexander menyes the landis of Bogfarlach with the pertinens for the redeming and
quittin out of thame fra Edmound banerman and paying of the some' that thai l
for and eftir as the chartir made tharupon proportis Nochtwithstanding that the forsaid
landis of bogfarlach war gravntit til him of before be certane persons
of the consel with the aldirman androw alanson that tyme gif it war likand
til him til quite oute the said landis eftir as the act made tharapon contenis
and beris witnes Quharfor the said Dauid colison opinly protestit
considering the said gravnt made til him of before / that quhatsumevir
promit or gravnt that thai haue made or done in contrar' tharof suld
nocht turne him til na preiudice nor dampniage anent his rycht in tyme tocum

The same day the consel beand present for the tyme has ordanit and consentit
that the aldirman gif to ser William scot xx s' of the common gudis And the said
ser William sal mak seruice in the qweyr quhil Witsunday next tocum

Item the same day William Rate has summittit him til the aldirman and the
consel til amend at the sycht of thame in alsfer as he has of
fendit and trespassit anent his seruice of tymes bygane And he
is oblist in tyme tocum to mak sa gude seruice that the aldirman and the toune
sal be plesit eftir his gudely power et cetera

Item the same day the Aldirman and the consel has decretit and ordanit that henry
bawne sal pay til thom bawne his bruthir sex merkis of vsuale money of
scotland for lent siluer and tocontent him tharof within terme of law And that ilkane of tham
sal gif demi li' wax to the haly blude mess' for strublance ilkane of vthir et cetera

Item the said day Dauid colison menyt him to the aldirman and the consel how
that he was haldyn suspect be androw alanson anent his compt of his
office of aldirmanschip and of Robert of culanys compt dene of gilde in
that tyme apon the quhilk comptis the said Dauid was chosin as ane
of the auditouris sayand that he had made na causse of Reson' til haue
beyn haldin suspect nor removit fra the saidis commptis as he vndirstude
ffor the quhilk he offerit him to preve before the aldirman and consel that in
The tyme that he as ane togiddir with certane vthiris auditouris sat apon
the deliuerence of the saidis acomptis that the toune was fundyn free and
oute of det (and that it was fundin sa that thai soulde hafe red and freit the ton'
betuix thaim of all thingis belanging the saidis acomptis of thar' officez) And rychtsa that
the said androw the last tym that he was aldirman togiddir with the baillies soulde haf
dischargit the ton' of baith the last taxis . Sayand that thocht the said androw has
gottin ane lettre of assedacion vndir the common seil of certane fisching eftir as the said lettre
proportis allegiand for the payment of the taxis It was agane the common proffit of this ton'
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio die xvjta Januarij /

quo die Duncanus mortimar
posuit se in voluntate prepositi pro iniusta occupacione artis liberi burgensis cum non sit liber
et pro tencione bothe Et ideo adiudicatur in amerciamento

Item dictus Duncanus mortimar pelliparius convictus per assisam de perturbacione vxoris
Willelmi coupar et Duncani seruitoris eiusdem Willelmi adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis et in
tercio amerciamento pro perturbacione cuiusdam Johannis Et in partem emende dabit dimidium li' cere ad
missam sancti sanguinis

The same day the assise has ordanit Dauy spens to content and pay
til Johne Wormot ane barel of salmound anent cristy litstar quhilum
burges of this burgh for the quhilk he is fundin dettour to the said Johne

Item the assise findis that the said Dauy spens soulde hafe a cobil and a net
assignit til him for the payment of the said barrel of salmond et cetera

The said day alexander sanquhare has tane to preve suffisantly on Wed
nisday next tocum and lachfully at ix houris before none that Wil quelpis
land of the quhilk Johne of catnes has ane annuel was strenyeabil
at all tymes bygane for the said annuel At the quhilk day comperit
the said Alexander sanquhare with his forspekar' Robert blindsel before
the aldirman and baillies sittand in Jugement / and producit for thare previs
the spous' of Johne of Dyse and philp of Dunbrekis wif quhilkis
the gret aith sworne and particulary examinit eftir the tenour of the
act aboue writin deponit that the said land of the quhilk Johne
of catnes clamit his annuel tobe awand til him was strenye
abil in diuers' gudis to the avale of a merk of annuel of termys
bygane clamit be the said Johne sen his entre with the annuel
of the said land for the quhilk the said alexander sanquhare and his
forspekar askit testimoniale of the court that the said land was
free of the said Johne of catnes annuel of all termys bygane
vnto this day videlicet the xviij day of Januar' the yer' et cetera lxxiiij

Dauid mar' inuenit gilbertum caus plegium legalem de indempnitate Johannis de mar
Similiter Johannes marr pater deuenit plegius per extensionem manus sue de indempnitate dicti Dauid
secundum quod Jura volunt

Curia legalis ballivorum tenta xxiiio die Januarij anno predicto quo die
sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum
Eodem die Johannes club in amerciamento pro iniusta capcione vnius le tow a Johanne gregorij

Marioria vxor Johannis sclatar et vxor alexandri Westland ipsarum quelibet in
amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem
Megota panton in amerciamento pro perturbacione sponse alexandri chamer seriandi et cetera

Item eodem die fynlaus fores conuictus fuit per assisam de amerciamento curie pro iniusta proiectione
vnius barelle salmonum thome symson de naui sua et ad emendum eidem
de dicta barrela salmonum prout Jura volunt

In curia ballivorum tenta xxiiijto die Januarij Willelmus cadiou convictus per assisam
de iniusta perturbacione Dauid blabir et Johannis lammynton adiudicatur in
ijobus amerciamentis curie et emendabit eisdem ad visum proborum

Eodem die fynlaus fores in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij super thomam
simson asserens ipsum iniuste tenuisse quadraginta solidos de naulo
ab eo / et dictus thomas quitus per assisam de dicto naulo

Item dictus fynlaus fores in alio amerciamento quia iniuste extendit plegium super dictum
thomam simonis asserendo ipsum thomam locasse debuisse et debere pro quadam
barella salmonum dicti thome impositu in naui sua / et contrarium adiudica
tum fuit per assisam

The same day fynlau fores has fundin Johne of lammyntone borch and souertee
for him tocontent and pay ane hamburgh barel of salmond til Donald rede at
mydsummir next tocum into tayn

Item eodem die fynlaus fores inuenit Willelmum cadiou plegium legalem pro eo de
indempnitate Donaldi rede aliter quam per viam Juris Et similiter dictus Donaldus dedit
alexandrum rede plegium de indempnitate dicti fynlai et cetera
